name.description: The SKU name of the account - only `Basic` is supported at this time.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Automation Account is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sku_name.description: The SKU name of the account - only `Basic` is supported at this time.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

dsc_server_endpoint.description: The DSC Server Endpoint associated with this Automation Account.

dsc_primary_access_key.description: The Primary Access Key for the DSC Endpoint associated with this Automation Account.

dsc_secondary_access_key.description: The Secondary Access Key for the DSC Endpoint associated with this Automation Account.

create.description: Used when creating the Automation Account.

update.description: Used when updating the Automation Account.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Automation Account.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Automation Account.
